tagline: Innovative. Reliable. Designed to meet your every need.
our_vision_des: Delta Misr For Plastic, Trade & Distribution (Delpack) is a leading company in the field of plastic packaging manufacturing, especially molded packaging, supporting a diverse range of consumer goods and industrial products known for their outstanding quality and high-purity materials. We believe in excellence, and through innovative manufacturing techniques, we provide the best products with the highest quality materials at the best competitive prices. We strive to make our products the preferred choice for our customers through quality and outstanding design.
goals_des: Our main goal and vision at Delta Misr For Plastic, Trade & Distribution - Delpack is to continuously strive for the highest quality in our products, and to engage in ongoing development and research to meet the evolving needs of the market and our customers.
strategy_des: We follow global quality standards, continuously improve and develop our work environment and production lines, and invest in human resource development through skilled labor training. We also ensure product diversity to deliver safe and high-quality products that uphold the company's reputation, which has been trusted for over 25 years by major companies operating in consumer markets.
get_in_touch: Get in touch for inquiries, collaborations, or support
knowledge_about_us: Get more knowledge about us and our industry
trusted_clients: Trusted by industry leaders and innovators worldwide.
company_description: Delta Misr Plastic Factories Delpack manufactures plastic containers (coloured, transparent and opaque) for many consumer goods and industrial products
